data.description: Method for the weblogs.com XML-RPC interface
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I'm not wild about the name, but it is arguably better than
    Net::Weblogsdotcom.

    I'm also not sure If I'm allowed to registered a second level
    namespace (UserLand::) without also having written anything for it.
    I was thinking that someone might want to hang something else of it,
    such as a Perl interface to the Manila XML-RPC interface.

    I chose "weblogUpdates" because that was the namespace that the
    XML-RPC methods live in.

    See also :

    http://www.xmlrpc.com/discuss/msgReader$2014?mode=day
    http://aaronland.net/src/perl/userland/Userland-weblogUpdates.html
    http://aaronland.net/src/perl/userland/weblog-update-0.3.1.tar.gz
